name: ROAD KILL (HendersonSoftworks)
description:
This was made for the 32bit jam 2022: https://itch.io/jam/32bit-jam-2022

Julie is lost in the forest and only you can save her! Dodge cars and trucks as you run through the darkness in hopes of finding her.

Dodge and jump over vehicles as they try to kill you.

Test your skills in ENDLESS MODE and beat your record!

Controls

A / D = Move Left / Right

Space = Jump

P = Pause

Credits

Design and development:

Thomas Henderson

Music:

LJ Kruzer - Chantiers Navals 412

techtheist - RustyScape

Serge Quadrado - Documentary Dark

Font:

Florisa - Limitype
